form.Label: Типы задач
form.Name: select
form.SQLselect:
SELECT ett.TaskTypeID, ett.TaskTypeName, ett.Description, IF(ett.Active, 'Да', 'Нет') AS Active, GROUP_CONCAT(ecl.ListName ORDER BY ecl.ListName SEPARATOR '
') AS ListName, etc.ConditionName, IF(ett.PostponeDays != 0, ett.PostponeDays, 'Нет') AS Postpone, IF(ett.NotifyCreate = 1, 'Да', 'Нет') AS NotifyCreate, IF(ett.NotifyDeadline = 1, 'Да', 'Нет') AS NotifyDeadline FROM employee_task_type ett LEFT JOIN employee_task_type_checklist ettcl ON ettcl.TaskTypeID = ett.TaskTypeID LEFT JOIN employee_checklist ecl ON ecl.ListID = ettcl.ListID LEFT JOIN employee_task_condition etc ON etc.ConditionID = ett.ConditionID GROUP BY ett.TaskTypeID ORDER BY ett.Active DESC, ett.TaskTypeName
